Learning

A compilation of learning resources across the web that I find most helpful. I wish this list existed when I first embarked upon the wilderness of R, Latex, and statistics.

Statistics

  • Asymptotic theory.

Git - version control

  • Dropbox as free Github private repo
  • Github workflow

R

  • Google's Style Guide. To develop good coding habit.
  • Web scrapping. To collect information printed on webpages. Prerequisite: XPath syntax
  • Regular expression. To manipulate string as you wish (useful for web scrapping, edit observations' names.)

Python

Linux

  • Mount a (university's) network drive (permenantly).
  • Install Stata 12 on Linux.
  • How to use Wine HQ.

SQL

  • Introduction to the "theory" of database.
  • Using PostgreSQL to command your space fleet against others!
